statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sale_region='North'
SELECT id, product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM SalesData ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT sale_region, COUNT(*) AS total_sales_count FROM SalesData GROUP BY sale_region ORDER BY total_sales_count DESC
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_region = 'North' AND sale_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_sales > 2 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sale_region FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_region ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sale_region = 'West' ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, price, product_name FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT sale_id, total_price, quantity FROM sales WHERE total_price <= 500 ORDER BY sale_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, sale_date FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE sales.quantity >= 10 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) as total_sales FROM sales GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 5 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT product_name, AVG(price) as avg_price, MAX(price) as max_price FROM products GROUP BY product_name HAVING avg_price > 30 ORDER BY max_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE order_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, order_date FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 500;
SELECT customer_name, email, city FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY order_date DESC, order_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT customer_name, email, city FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_amount FROM customers JOIN sales_data ON customers.customer_id = sales_data.customer_id WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY order_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT transaction_id, order_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category IN ('Electronics', 'Clothing') ORDER BY product_price DESC;

SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_name, product_name, order_quantity FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount >= 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, order_total FROM sales_data ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT order_id, order_date, delivery_status FROM orders WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY order_date DESC, order_total ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, delivery_status FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE o.delivery_status = 'delivered';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, od.quantity, od.unit_price FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.payment_status = 'paid';

SELECT o.order_id, c.customer_name, SUM(od.subtotal) AS total_price FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id GROUP BY o.order_id, c.customer_name HAVING total_price > 1000 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
